body:
thanks for your feedback.

we have a public api defined that doesn't change in an incompatible way between version. it will be stable even between major version jumps like 4.5 to 5.
so it 3rd party app developers only use this api then no problems should happen.
it is possible that some internal functionality is not yet available via the public api but then the 3rd party developers should contact the core developer so that we can fix that.

frank

thank you frank! that is very comforting. in the amahi home server 
project there are around 350+ installations in the user base, last i 
heard. many of us are very dependent on certain 3rd party apps. the 
amahi project likes to try and stay up to date with current owncloud 
version releases.

thank you for the quick response!

ken neiser
stony plain, alberta
canada
